short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically opts you out of inclusion for third-party AI datasets when submitting new work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't like that submitting you art is opted into the AI art generator dataset by default? This extension will automatically select the checkbox for making it opt-out by default for you.
